Articles.Content:
Ok, so this is a smal and simple little game.

-----------------
Examples:

Comment_#0: Well okay i guess i start...

Comment_#1: Classic comment 5/10
[A comment of your choice, could be anything]

Comment_#2: [Comment about the users above comment (The one that is marked by the [] things]
[A comment of your choice, could be anything]
-----------------

Good luck, and i hope you are understanding the example above, i am sadly not so good on explaining stuff :(
Don't be so hard on yourself, that was actually a very good explanation.

5/10

Comment was fantastic but failure to apply the rules degrade ranking by 50%

5/10

Not interesting enough. Needs more confetti.
